content: this pattern will make sweaters ranging from a small preemie to 12 months the sizing comes from using different yarn weights and different hook sizes the smaller sizes use a sport weight yarn and the larger sizes use a worsted weight yarn the hooks sizes range from a g to a k sizes and gauges small preemie 12-13 chest finished measurement hook g sport weight yarn 10 double_crochet and 6 row = 2 x 2 preemie 14 chest finished measurement hook h sport weight yarn 8 5 double_crochet and 5 5 row = 2 x 2 small newborn 15 chest finished measurement hook i sport weight yarn 8 double_crochet and 5 row = 2 x 2 newborn 16 chest finished measurement hook h worsted weight yarn 4 5 double_crochet and 4 5 row = 2 x 2 3 month 18 chest finished measurement hook i worsted weight yarn 7 double_crochet and 4 25 row = 2 x 2 6 month 19 chest finished measurement hook j worsted weight yarn 6 5 double_crochet and just over 4 row = 2 x 2 12 month 20 chest finished measurement hook k worsted weight yarn 6 double_crochet and 4 row = 2 x 2 - see more at http //kimations blogspot com/2014/04/nessas-sweater html#sthash rgush3c7 dpuf
